Description: A Brazilian gun manufacturer agreed to pay over $37 million to resolve class action litigation alleging that it produced weapons with a defect that could cause them to go off when dropped. The company previously paid $239 million to settle a similar case (see separate entry).
Private Litigation Case Title: Burrow et al v. Forjas Taurus, S.A. et al
